metadata.title: USN-5135-1 -- Linux kernel vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that the Linux kernel did not properly account for the memory usage of certain IPC objects. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (memory exhaustion).  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5135-1` to fix the vulnerability.
